name: CentoQuest
description:
In this game, you'll have the power to write a patchwork poem, also known as a "cento."

I've selected a few of my favorite books of poetry for you to start with, but feel free to take a look around if you'd like some more material. Sometimes language shows up when you're least expecting it.

(Note: This is still a work in progress.  Check back from time to time for more branching paths, more featured source texts, and a generally better quality of life -- for both the game and, hopefully, you.)
